subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Aviation Accidents and Safety
Series
lead_paragraph: The veteran Coach Pyotr Vorobyov directed Yaroslavl Lokomotiv in its first season after the plane crash that wiped out the Russian team’s roster.
snippet: The veteran Coach Pyotr Vorobyov directed Yaroslavl Lokomotiv in its first season after the plane crash that wiped out the Russian team’s roster.
